article_title: Peace vigil calls for unity a year after attacks
sentence: It  happened  on  the  eve  of  the  one-year  anniversary  of  the  7  October  Hamas  attacks,  which  saw  gunmen  storm  into  Israel,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  taking  251  hostage.

article_title: Peace vigil calls for unity a year after attacks
sentence: Israel  responded  with  a  military  campaign  in  Gaza  that  has  seen  at  least  41,000  people  killed,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
